moves.title: Laser (Neutral Special)
changes: Laser spawn height now matches the current position of Falco instead of where he was on the previous frame

moves.title: Laser (Neutral Special)
changes: Laser spawn height now matches the current position of Fox instead of where he was on the previous frame

moves.title: Inhale (Neutral Special)
changes: Captain Falcon hat adjusted by one frame to match Falcon
Sparkle effect added to Diddy Kong hat on frame 10
Falco’s hat frame data now matches Falco
Ice Climbers hat damage adjusted to match ICs’
Ike’s hat now has shrunken hitboxes and sound effect moved one frame
Knuckles hat damage lowered to match Knuckles’
Luigi hat sound effect shifted to frame 15
Meta Knight’s hat can now be started on the ground, and hitboxes now match Meta Knight’s
Mewtwo hat now plays a sound effect while charging
Pikachu’s hat sound effects adjusted to frame 12, damage changed to match Pikachu
Pit hat audio now works properly
ROB’s hat damage adjusted to match ROB, audio shifted by one frame
Sheik hat needle hitboxes adjusted to match Sheik’s
Zelda's hat frame data between air and ground now matches Zelda

moves.title: Spin Dash (Down Special)
changes: Bucket Braking removed completely

moves.title: General
changes: Pikmin no longer rotate when grabbing ledge and can no longer get stuck in the stage

moves.title: Spin Dash (Down Special)
changes: Bucket Braking removed completely

changes.title: Default
changes: Updated to latest version

changes.title: (R-alt) Dead Line GHZ
changes: Updated to latest version

changes.title: Default
changes: Revamped visuals and optimized to be playable at 60FPS in 4-player matches while also reducing filesize

changes.title: (R-alt) Marble Zone GHZ
changes: Revamped visuals and optimized to be playable at 60FPS in 4-player matches while also reducing filesize

changes.title: (Z-alt) Radical Highway GHZ
changes: Updated to latest version

moves.title: Onett
changes: Car behaviour now matches Brawl

changes.title: (L+R-alt) Green Screen FD
changes: Now has PM FD’s collisions and blastzones

moves.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Error data among various fighter files removed

Animation Engine code removed; frame speed modifiers relevant instead implemented directly into the movesets to perform the same operations, as this code is a relic from an older period in Brawl modding
Frame speed modifiers no longer reset when transitioning between states, synchronizing air-to-ground or ground-to-air transitions properly
Kirby will no longer cause characters to be unable to die in Stamina Mode
Charizard Glide, Side Special, grab, and up throw restored to previous behavior, file should now match previous versions 1:1
Completing All-Star with Giga Bowser no longer crashes the game
Ike’s Z alt now has its proper trails
Ike’s effect bank rewritten from Brawl, which should hopefully prevent the GFX crash related to using Eruption
Ivysaur’s healing sounds now always play on bulb sweetspots regardless of percent
Kirby’s fighter skin will no longer t-pose in matches with lots of data used
Lucario no longer has excessive GFX with a fully charged Aura Sphere
Facial expressions on Marth, Snake, and Toon Link cleaned up
Pikachu’s Up Special drift restored to previous behavior
Sonic no longer has increased gravity when hit out of Down Special
Sonic can no longer be sent into special fall out of Down Special if a Blast Attack was used without a double jump before another spin move
K.K. Slider now appears in Event 26, as intended
Stages for Event 9 and Event 38 fixed
Pressing B during replays no longer hard crashes the console (New in 2.26)
Dedede and Kirby swallowcides should now always give the victory to the inhaler (New in 2.26)
R.O.B. no longer has strange interactions when landing onstage with Side Special (New in 2.26)
Toon Link's zair restored to 12 frames of landing lag, after it was unintentionally changed to 14 in 2.2 (New in 2.26)
Fixed materials on Zero Mission ZSS' hair (New in 2.26)
Ness' eye areas on PJ/hidden skins in certain lighting will now match the rest of his skin (New in 2.26)

moves.title: Stages
changes: Materials fixed on Beachville
Sound Effects restored on Bob-Omb Battlefield
Clock Tower’s textures fixed to look proper
Peach’s Castle now has a proper double rainbow
Lighting adjusted on Pokémon Stadium 2
Restored missing collision on Poké Floats 2
Training Room and its L alt now plays nice with transparent objects
Lighting effects fixed on Venom
The water on Battlefield now animates for an entire match instead of stopping after 90 seconds (New in 2.26)

moves.title: Costumes
changes: Ocarina of Time and Fierce Deity Link alts updated
Earthbound 64 Lucas’ eyes now match his renders
Sunshine Peach semi-alt cleaned up
Fire Peach received updated hair from aforementioned cleanup
Aforementioned Peach costumes and Shadow Queen alts have updated Toads
Pirate Yoshi alt revamped

moves.title: Character Polish
changes: Giga Bowser given a more impactful landing effect on up smash
Unique trails for Dark Pit and Hector Ike adjusted in color
Arrows for the Dark Pit costumes updated to be more consistent with the Brawl arrow aesthetic
Materials adjusted on Treasure Hunter Knuckles
Meta Knight’s wings now stay out after a glide finishes
Snake now enters his edge slip animation when falling backward off a ledge during the box taunt
Stray vertice on Outset Toon Link removed
Retro Falcon no longer has duplicate teeth
Varying GFX on taunt input restored on Peach Bomber (New in 2.26)
Ivysaur's Solar Beam GFX now matches the hitboxes, all the way out (New in 2.26)

moves.title: New Console Launcher

changes.title: Added new autoboot feature
changes: Hold A while autoboot is enabled to access launcher menu
Autoboot can be disabled in config.xml

changes.title: USB loader is now merged with main launcher

changes: PAL 480p is now supported
Update system ready for any future P+ updates
Added support for all Brawl regions, based on the GCT (Note: does not affect the mod itself. P+ still requires the NTSC version of Brawl due to coding limitations.)
Fixed addon menu scrolling
Background texture is now seamless
Improved ADDONS texture

moves.title: Other
changes: Air dodge scaling restored due to popular demand
Clipping in the top left corner of the CSS fixed
Super Mario World logo updated on the SSS to be more consistent with other stage game logos
Imagery for various updated stages in 2.2 matched in the RSS and Replay menus
“Remix 10” now has its full loop
The Replay Manager now gets its path automatically if in the same folder as Dolphin.exe, no longer prompts the user again if they hit cancel, and confirms file deletion
Updater will no longer be flagged by antivirus software (sorry!)
Strap and Results screens updated for version 2.26
